environmentVariables.description: [Map] Google Map API key
environmentVariables.name: MT_GOOGLE_MAP_KEY

environmentVariables.description: [Image.gemini] Gemini Image Api key
environmentVariables.name: MT_GEMINI_IMAGE_KEY

environmentVariables.description: [Image.gemini] Number of retries when generating Gemini images Default: 0
environmentVariables.name: MT_MAX_RETRY_GEMINI

environmentVariables.description: [Image.gemini] Character reference image uri (file:// or https://) when generating Gemini image. Multiple settings can be made by separating them with the '|'. When multiple settings are made, they will be selected randomly.
environmentVariables.name: MT_AVATAR_IMAGE_URI

environmentVariables.description: [Map.etc] Optional: Map API custom endpoint. Example: direction=https://xxxx,places=https://yyyy
environmentVariables.name: MT_MAP_API_URL

environmentVariables.description: [Map] Optional:Scale of travel time on real roads duration. default 4
environmentVariables.name: MT_TIME_SCALE

environmentVariables.description: [db.local] db save path: e.g. %USERPROFILE%/Desktop/traveler.sqlite ,$HOME/traveler.sqlite
environmentVariables.name: MT_SQLITE_PATH

environmentVariables.description: [db.api] Turso sqlite API URL
environmentVariables.name: MT_TURSO_URL

environmentVariables.description: [db.api] Turso sqlite API access token
environmentVariables.name: MT_TURSO_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: [rembg.local] absolute path of the installed rembg cli
environmentVariables.name: MT_REMBG_PATH

environmentVariables.description: [rembg.api] withoutbg.com rembg API URL
environmentVariables.name: MT_REMBG_URL

environmentVariables.description: [rembg.api] withoutbg.com rembg API key
environmentVariables.name: MT_REMBG_WO_KEY

environmentVariables.description: [Image.pixAi] pixAi API key
environmentVariables.name: MT_PIXAI_KEY

environmentVariables.description: [Image.sd] Stability.ai image generation API key
environmentVariables.name: MT_SD_KEY

environmentVariables.description: [Image.pixAi] Optional: pixAi ModelId, if not set use default model 1648918127446573124
environmentVariables.name: MT_PIXAI_MODEL_ID

environmentVariables.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Option: Generate image using ComfyUI API at specified URL. Example: http://192.168.1.100:8188
environmentVariables.name: MT_COMFY_URL

environmentVariables.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Optional: Path to API workflow file when using text to image with ComfyUI. If not specified: assets/comfy/t2i_sample.json
environmentVariables.name: MT_COMFY_WORKFLOW_T2I

environmentVariables.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Optional: Path of API workflow file when image to image in ComfyUI. If not specified: assets/comfy/i2i_sample.json
environmentVariables.name: MT_COMFY_WORKFLOW_I2I

environmentVariables.description: [Image.local.ComfyUi] Optional: Variable values to send to the workflow via comfyUI API
environmentVariables.name: MT_COMFY_PARAMS

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Fixed avatar generation prompt. You will no longer be able to change your avatar during conversations.
environmentVariables.name: MT_FIXED_MODEL_PROMPT

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Acceptable avatar image area ratio. default 0.042
environmentVariables.name: MT_BODY_AREA_RATIO

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Acceptable avatar image aspect ratios. default 1.5~2.3
environmentVariables.name: MT_BODY_HW_RATIO

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Avatar composite window horizontal ratio. default 0.5
environmentVariables.name: MT_BODY_WINDOW_RATIO_W

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Optional: Avatar composite window aspect ratio. default 0.75
environmentVariables.name: MT_BODY_WINDOW_RATIO_H

environmentVariables.description: [Sns.Bs] Bluesky sns registration address
environmentVariables.name: MT_BS_ID

environmentVariables.description: [Sns.Bs] bluesky sns password
environmentVariables.name: MT_BS_PASS

environmentVariables.description: [Sns.Bs] bluesky sns handle name: e.g. xxxxxxxx.bsky.social
environmentVariables.name: MT_BS_HANDLE

environmentVariables.description: [etc] Optional: Directly filter the tools to be used. All are available if not specified. e.g. tips,set_traveler_location
environmentVariables.name: MT_FILTER_TOOLS

environmentVariables.description: [etc] Option: Specify whether the movement mode is 'realtime' or 'skip'. default realtime
environmentVariables.name: MT_MOVE_MODE

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Option: Output image width (pixels) Default is 512
environmentVariables.name: MT_IMAGE_WIDTH

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Options: 'true' = do not output image, not specified = output image if possible, default is not specified
environmentVariables.name: MT_NO_IMAGE

environmentVariables.description: [Image] Option: 'true' = Output StreetView image as is without avatar superimposition. Not specified = Superimpose avatar image. Default is not specified.
environmentVariables.name: MT_NO_AVATAR

environmentVariables.description: [Sns] Optional: Specify the feed tag when posting to SNS (#required, 15 characters or more) Default is #geo_less_traveler
environmentVariables.name: MT_FEED_TAG

environmentVariables.description: [Streamable-http] Maximum number of sessions when using Streamable-http
environmentVariables.name: MT_MAX_SESSIONS

environmentVariables.description: [Streamable-http] Session TTL when using Streamable-http
environmentVariables.name: MT_SESSION_TTL_MS

environmentVariables.description: [Streamable-http] Service TTL when using Streamable-http
environmentVariables.name: MT_SERVICE_TTL_MS

servers.name: io.github.ubaumann/mkdocs-mcp
servers.description: An MCP server that provides serves MkDocs as resources.

environmentVariables.description: Path to the MkDocs project
environmentVariables.name: MKDOCS_PROJECT_PATH

servers.name: com.pga/pga-golf
servers.description: PGA's official MCP Server for all things golf-related. Find a coach, play golf, improve your game.

servers.name: io.catchmetrics.mcp/rum-analytics
servers.description: RUM platform for web performance analytics, Core Web Vitals, and third-party script monitoring.

servers.name: io.github.leshchenko1979/fast-mcp-telegram
servers.description: Telegram MCP server with search and messaging capabilities

environmentVariables.description: Telegram API ID (from https://my.telegram.org/apps)
environmentVariables.name: API_ID

environmentVariables.description: Telegram API Hash (from https://my.telegram.org/apps)
environmentVariables.name: API_HASH

environmentVariables.description: Server mode: stdio (local), http-no-auth (dev), http-auth (prod)
environmentVariables.name: SERVER_MODE

environmentVariables.description: Custom session directory (defaults to ~/.config/fast-mcp-telegram/)
environmentVariables.name: SESSION_DIR

servers.name: io.github.pree-dew/mcp-bookmark
servers.description: MCP Server for adding bookmarks in openai RAG

environmentVariables.description: open ai api key
environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY

servers.name: io.github.YinTokey/mcp_hackernews
servers.description: MCP server exposing a simple Hacker News search tool (top stories).

servers.name: io.github.p1va/symbols
servers.description: MCP server to read, inspect and troubleshoot codebase symbols

servers.name: io.github.yuna0x0/anilist-mcp
servers.description: AniList MCP server for accessing AniList API data

environmentVariables.description: AniList API token for authenticated requests
environmentVariables.name: ANILIST_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: AniList API token for authenticated requests
environmentVariables.name: ANILIST_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: AniList API token for authenticated requests
environmentVariables.name: ANILIST_TOKEN

servers.name: ai.smithery/brave
servers.description: Visit https://brave.com/search/api/ for a free API key. Search the web, local businesses, images,…

servers.name: io.github.timheuer/sampledotnetmcpserver
servers.description: Sample .NET MCP Server

servers.name: io.github.marlenezw/publish-mcp-server
servers.description: An MCP server that helps developers publish their MCP servers to the registry
